Title: Authorizes the Friendship Engine and Hose Company to file an application for exemption from real property taxes
Summary: Authorizes the Friendship Engine and Hose Company to file an application for exemption from real property taxes with respect to the 2021-2022 and 2022-2023 assessment rolls.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the Friendship Engine and Hose Company to file an application for exemption from real property taxes
